001package pokedex.api;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004
005public class PokemonMetadataProvider implements IPokemonMetadataProvider {
006
007    ArrayList<PokemonMetadata> metadataList;
008
009    /**
010     * Constructor of PokemonMetadataProvider
011     * */
012    public PokemonMetadataProvider() {
013        this.metadataList = new ArrayList<PokemonMetadata>();
014        metadataList.add(new PokemonMetadata(0, "Bulbizarre", 126, 126, 90));
015        metadataList.add(new PokemonMetadata(133, "Aquali", 186, 168, 260));
016    }
017
018
019    /**
020     * Return the metadata of a Pokemon
021     * */
022    @Override
023    public PokemonMetadata getPokemonMetadata(int index) throws PokedexException {
024        if (index < 0 || index > 150) {
025            throw new PokedexException("Erreur sur l'index du Pokemon");
026        }
027        for (PokemonMetadata pokemon : metadataList) {
028            int id = pokemon.getIndex();
029            if (id == index) {
030                return new PokemonMetadata(id, pokemon.getName(), pokemon.getAttack(), pokemon.getDefense(), pokemon.getStamina());
031            }
032        }
033        return null;
034    }
035
036}
